sentences.en: After menopause, when estrogen levels plummet, some women become forgetful.
sentences.cn: 绝经期后, 当雌激素水平骤然下降, 一些女性开始变得健忘.

sentences.en: After the menopause a woman cannot bear a child.
sentences.cn: 妇女绝经后就不能生育了。

sentences.en: An acceleration of bone loss begins along with estrogenic deficiency after menopause.
sentences.cn: 随看绝经雌激素的缺乏,病人出现以松质骨为主的骨加速丢失.

sentences.en: Before menopause, when estrogen is plentiful, it beats 27 HC to the receptors.
sentences.cn: 在绝经前, 当雌激素含量充足时, 它与27HC竞争并与受体结合.

sentences.en: Breast cancer: Malignant tumour in a Breast, usually in women after menopause.
sentences.cn: 乳癌: 亦称乳腺癌.乳腺的恶性肿瘤, 多见于停经期后的女性.

sentences.en: But as estrogen declines after menopause, 27 HC takes over.
sentences.cn: 但绝经后随着雌激素含量的降低, 27HC取而代之的与受体结合.

sentences.en: Debate has raged around the possibility of male menopause for decades.
sentences.cn: 关于男人更年期是否存在问题争论已持续数十年.

sentences.en: During the transition into menopause, some women an increased risk for depression.
sentences.cn: 当女性进入更年期, 一部分人患抑郁症疾病的几率更高.

sentences.en: Male menopause is a lot moreo fun than female menopause.
sentences.cn: 男性的更年期比女性的更有趣.

sentences.en: Menopause is a natural biological process, not a medical illness.
sentences.cn: 绝经是自然的生理过程, 并非医学疾病.

sentences.en: More women are starting to take calcium supplements after menopause.
sentences.cn: 愈来愈多女性开始在更年期来临后服用钙片.

sentences.en: Other factors may include illness, pregnancy, menopause, regular exercise or simply age.
sentences.cn: 其它的因素可能包括疾病 、 怀孕 、 更年期, 定期体育锻炼,或仅仅是由于衰老.

sentences.en: Postmenopausal osteoporosis ( PMOF ) is the common disease, frequently - occurring disease after menopause.
sentences.cn: 绝经后骨质疏松症 ( PMOP ) 是绝经后妇女常见病 、 多发病.

sentences.en: The five women's menstrual periods : tea, pregnant women, after birth , production, menopause.
sentences.cn: 女性不宜喝茶的五个时期:月 经来时, 孕妇, 临产前, 生产完后, 更年期.

sentences.en: The male menopause is said to affect men who are approaching middle age.
sentences.cn: 据说步入中年的男人会经历男性更年期.

sentences.en: There were significant differences between two groups in menopause duration , ALP, BGP, BMD, and IL - 6 ( P & gt; 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 绝经年限、血总碱性磷酸酶(ALP) 、 血清骨钙素(BGP) 、 骨密度 、 血浆IL -6 浓度有显著性差异 ( P & lt; 0.05 ).

trans.tran_cn: [医]停经，经绝（期），活动终止期，更年期，绝经期
trans.tran_en: the time when a woman stops  menstruat ing  ,which usually happens around the age of 50
